attributes.action: Stop putting the British people down and to stop changing the British way of life so as to please others.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I like many others are sick and fed up with British people being put down, we have had lottery grants turned down in the past because there were not enough ethnics, we recently had a young lady in the newspaper that was told not to apply for a job because she was English, we now have the ridiculous situation whereby “The Red Arrows" can't fly at the Olympics because they are too British. Shame on you all, enough is enough. Why don't you just cancel the Olympics, the Red Arrows would have been the only thing worth watching anyway.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
